Peter New (born October 30, 1971) is a Canadian actor, voice artist, and screenwriter, best known for his roles as Big McIntosh in ' and Sunil Nevla in "Littlest Pet Shop".
He received a 2002 Leo Award for Best Screenwriter (Music, Comedy, or Variety Program or Series), for episode #112 of the TV series "Point Blank".
In 2007, New's script "The Bar" won the first annual Hot Shot Shorts Film Contest. His short film "Woodman" is a 2017 selection at the LA Shorts Fest.
